tags.Radio Button:

tags.Select:
<label for="selectboxes">Choose boxes:</label>
 <select name="selectboxs" id="boxs">
 <option value="box1">Box 1</option>
 <option value="box2">Box 2</option>
 <option value="box3">Box 3</option>
 <option value="box4">Box 4</option>
</select>
tags.Textarea:
<label for="w3review">Review of W3Schools:</label>

 <textarea id="textarea1" name="textarea1" rows="4" cols="50">
This is a text area which is often used in a form, to collect user inputs like comments or reviews.
A text area can hold an unlimited number of characters, and the text renders in a fixed-width font 
</textarea>
